thread.title: Cozy Toes Fun Run

title: Cozy Toes Fun Run
text: Gallery   Walk, jog, and run to help those in need during the winter. Please bring gently used clean running shoes, and new hats and gloves for the homeless. This is going to be a new kind of race for Fit & Able. Basically, run as much or as little as you want! Youâ€™ll have 90 minutes to run as far and as fast as you can. There will be prizes for Most Miles, Fastest Mile, Greatest Negative Split, Youngest Miler, and Oldest Miler. How many laps can you do in 90 minutes? Runner registration begins at 8 AM. Location
